solution_line_template: The team has {num_girls} girls because {total_players} x {girls_percentage_decimal} = <<{total_players}*{girls_percentage_decimal}={num_girls}>>{num_girls}
The team has {num_junior_girls} junior girls because {num_girls} / {girls_are_juniors_divisor} = <<{num_girls}/{girls_are_juniors_divisor}={num_junior_girls}>>{num_junior_girls}
